item.title: Out Of My Mind Interview: Phoebe-Rae Taylor & Rosemarie DeWitt Discuss The Film's Universal Themes
item.description: ScreenRant interviews stars Phoebe-Rae Taylor and Rosemarie DeWitt about sharing the screen together and Out of My Mind's universal message.

item.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean Franchise Update May Have Just Revived Hopes For Johnny Depp's Return
item.description: A new report on the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise updates the status of the potential POTC 6, and boosts hopes of a Johnny Depp return.
